citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS employee for an inspection at 12:30 PM on
12/2/2014.
Licensee was unavailable according to his son. A responsible adult must be available for inspection.
